extendedInfo.description: The Drive Android app allows you to search for new and used cars on the go, wherever you might be. What can the app do for you?The app makes searching for a car easy:â¢ Select and search thousands of new and used cars for sale from around Australiaâ¢ Search by make, model, location, price range, KM's, engine and body type, transmission type and moreâ¢ View specific car information and detailsâ¢ Directly enquire about a car that you're interested inâ¢ Search for Dealers by make, model, location or keywordâ¢ View the dealer profile and their contact information, as well as viewing their available carsPlus, our app helps you manage your search process by allowing you to:â¢ Refine your search criteria by advertiser type; dealers, private party or bothâ¢ Shortlist cars that you're interested inâ¢ Sync your Drive.com.au account with your Android phone so you can save and view your short listed cars no matter where you areâ¢ Email your short-listed cars to yourself or a friendTo provide feedback and/or suggestions on the Drive Android app, please email promotions@drive.com.au

reviews.title: Very silly search app
reviews.comment: Such a poor app- you can select car brands from available list, but then they ask you for makes and even though you select something it shows 0 results
reviews.author: Alex Andrasch

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Needs improvement to match carsales. Search refinement would be a good start.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bloody great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poorly designed and executed.
reviews.comment: There is nothing I like or enjoy about the app. The layout is poor and the search parameters are lacking choice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor effort!
reviews.comment: When you refine a search, look at a listing then return to the search results list it removes all refinements you just did. Poor effort from this app. Don\'t bother!
reviews.author: Jason Barone

reviews.title: Limited search fields.
reviews.comment: Does not allow search or filer by number of seats. Even details of cars shown does not include information about number of seats.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s crap
reviews.comment: Just that, it\'s crap! Uninstall!
reviews.author: Kerri Siemens

reviews.title: Me_au
reviews.comment: Works first few times then won\'t open. Reported the issue about 4 times and nothing done. Apparently they don\'t care if it works or not as long as people are paying for the ads, to bad no one can see them....
reviews.author: Douglas Gordon

reviews.title: Where r the refinements?
reviews.comment: Come on Drive. Not being able to refine by model. Or even year. Pls have this fixed asap!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps on crashing

reviews.comment: User friendly

reviews.title: Refine and sort Avery average
reviews.comment: Filter results to <150000KM. I still get results with junk cars over 300000km.  Sort reslts by price, or year? Nope you get it served to you any ways
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps crashing when opened
reviews.comment: App opens first of but from then on it keeps crashing.

reviews.comment: Does what it says. Great app

reviews.comment: Great app. Easy to use. Love it.

reviews.title: Sad very sad
reviews.comment: Carsales is soooo much better

reviews.title: don\'t bother
reviews.comment: load of crap. dosnt allow search by model and fails to return results on a search with more than one word

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Love it better than car sales app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: This isn\'t an app, this is a joke.. No model selection, no advanced criteria, no refine feature. This is a basic form-based database query... a pathetic excuse for an app.
reviews.author: Ryan Watson
